update player notification from PlayerService via startForeground()

Android system remembers notification set with startForeground and restores
it when application was killed and restored back.

I'm going to move widget and player service code to separate process later,
so Android will be able to kill activity process w/o killing foreground
service.

DownloadStartReceiver: fix permission issue on Xperia devices

On xperia devices (seen on ZR and Z2) download manager has no rights to
write to secondary external storage. Solution is to download to primary
storage and then copy to secondary.

PlayerService: fix serivce restart handling

Android may restart activity before service, then service will be
started by activity and intent will not be null. To reinit widget on
every service restart move associated code to onCreate()
